1) You can enable advanced mode in ArcBi: 1) You can enable advanced mode in ArcBit's wallet and import your account public key as an watch only account, then go to the actions sections and click 'Get Unspent Outputs'. This method is recommended.
1) You can enable advanced mode in ArcBit's wallet and import your account public key (that was generated in step 1) as an watch only account. This method is recommended.
2) You can use Arcbit's Brain Wallet too: 2) You can use Arcbit's Brain Wallet tool to generate your addresses manually back in step 1. The drawback is that you have to keep track of which addresses to receive bitcoins into. (This method can be done offline)
2) You can use the form below. You have: 2) You can use the form below. You have to input the account public key and the address IDs of the addresses you received bitcoins into.

After you have bitcoins your account, yo: After you have bitcoins your account, you can fetch blockchain data on your account. Then either download or copy the account data to a file. Then take to file to your offline computer and load ArcBit's Brain Wallet tool to authorize the transaction with your private keys. Then take the signed authorized transaction data to step 5.

After you finish, please store the piece: After you finish, please store the piece of paper in a safe place, and never type it on a computer unless you need to recover your lost wallet!

Each account has an account ID and a col: Each account has an account ID and a collection of addresses asscociated with it.
Enable advance mode in your Arcbit walle: Enable advance mode in your Arcbit wallet and import this watch only key into to your ArcBit wallet. You can monitor your account balance, and transactions with this key, but you cannot spend with it.
Enable to expose features including abil: Enable to expose features including ability to import private keys (including bip38 encrypted keys), watch only addresses, xpubs, xprivs and the ability to see all account addresses
Enabling this will always save your wall: Enabling this will always save your wallet in encrypted format. This means that your login password is required after you close your browser or the tab. By default your login password is your backup passphrase. It is recommended that this feature be enabled if you hold significant amount of Bitcoins in this wallet.

Note: Decryption password is the same as: Note: Decryption password is the same as your login password at the time you backed up this wallet file.
Offline spend is a feature that allows y: Offline spend is a feature that allows you to safely spend your Bitcoins from cold storage without ever having your private keys be exposed to the internet. Follow the instructions below to create a cold storage wallet. If you have done so, go to step 2 to deposit your bitcoins into cold storage or go to step 3 to spend from cold storage.
Only one reusable address recipient per: Only one reusable address recipient per transaction allowed
Password is required to log back in. By: Password is required to log back in. By default your password is your 12 word backup passphrase, which is found in settings.
Paste the transaction into the text area: Paste the transaction into the text area and send the transaction.
People generally don’t know how to creat: People generally don’t know how to create secure passwords. If you want to continue, make sure you learn how to create a secure password. Arcbit won’t have any restrictions on your password. By default your password is your 12 word backup passphrase.
Private key does not match address: Private key does not match address
Private key not found for address: Private key not found for address
Restore bitcoins and all other wallet da: Restore bitcoins and all other wallet data from file
Save that webpage to a usb drive and the: Save that webpage to a usb drive and then plug the usb drive into an offline computer, preferably one that never touched the internet. Then open the webpage and follow the instructions in step 1 to create your secure cold storage wallet. Step 1 and 4 should be done offline with the saved webpage, and step 2, 3 ad 5 should be done online.
Scan For Missing Reusable Address Paymen: Scan For Missing Reusable Address Payment
Send error: Not enough unspent outputs: Send error: Not enough unspent outputs
Sending payment to a reusable address mi: Sending payment to a reusable address might take longer to show up then a normal transaction with the blockchain.info API. You might have to wait until at least 1 confirmation for the transaction to show up. This is due to the limitations of the blockchain.info API. For reusable address payments to show up faster, configure your app to use the Insight API in advance settings.
Step 1) Input your account private key. This key is use to sign and authorize the transaction.
Step 2) Load the account data file or pa: Step 2) Load the account data file or paste it into the text area below.
Step 3) Input the address and amount tha: Step 3) Input the address and amount that you wish to spend
Step 4) Click 'Sign Transaction' to crea: Step 4) Click 'Sign Transaction' to create the raw transaction. Copy the raw transaction to a usb device. Then back in your ArcBit wallet, go to step 5 of ArcBit's brain wallet section to send your transaction.
The backup passphrase alone can recover: The backup passphrase alone can recover all your wallet account's bitcoins, so make sure to back it up and keep it safe.
The backup passphrase alone can recover all your wallet account's bitcoins (excluding imported accounts and addresses), so make sure to back it up and keep it safe.
There are two ways to deposit bitcoins i: There are two ways to deposit bitcoins into cold storage
There are two ways to fetch blockchain d: There are two ways to fetch blockchain data on your account
These 12 words are your wallet backup pa: These 12 words are your wallet backup passphrase. It will unlock complete access to your bitcoins, without the need for any password, even if you can't access your computer anymore. The backup passphrase is essential to recover your wallet, so please write it down on a piece of paper before continuing.
This feature is used to fetch unspent ou: This feature is used to fetch unspent outputs so that you can sign and authorize a transaction using ArcBit's brain wallet tool.
This file is password protected, write t: This file is password protected, write the password to unlock
This key is use to authorize and spend t: This key is use to authorize and spend transactions
To create a cold storage wallet first do: To create a cold storage wallet first download ArcBit's Brain Wallet tool in the following linked here,
To create a new cold storage, click 'New: To create a new cold storage, click 'New wallet' to create a unique 12 word backup passphrase. Then back up the generated backup passphrase by paper or memory and keep it to yourself. The backup passphrase iself can recover all your bitcoins.
To confirm you've written down your back: To confirm you've written down your backup passphrase correctly, please type it here:

Transaction is not a reusable address tr: Transaction is not a reusable address transaction
URL needs to start with https://: URL needs to start with https://
Use this tool to sign a message which pr: Use this tool to sign a message which proves that you own an address. You can verify messages in the tools sections, which is found in settings.
Watch only accounts cannot see reusable: Watch only accounts cannot see reusable address payments
Wallet must be loaded to rename: Wallet must be loaded to rename
With the ArcBit Brain Wallet you can saf: With the ArcBit Brain Wallet you can safely spend your bitcoins without ever having your private keys be exposed to the internet. It can be use in conjunction with the ArcBit Wallet or as a stand alone wallet.
Write your backup passphrase then click: Write your backup passphrase then click finish:
You are making a payment to a reusable a: You are making a payment to a reusable address. Make sure that the receiver can see the payment made to them. (All ArcBit reusable addresses are compatible with other ArcBit wallet)
You can also input a backup passphrase,: You can also input a backup passphrase, account private key or account public key and view the addresses and private keys of the inputted wallet or accounts.
You can spend from a watch only account: You can spend from a watch only account by importing the account private key before you spend, or you can use the ArcBit brain wallet tool to make a transaction without ever having your private keys touch a internet facing computer.
You have another wallet with that name!: You have another wallet with that name!
